attributes.action: Stop the north of Tyne mayor being appointed,
attributes.background: We already have a mayor of north Tyneside and numerous councillors, why do we need more. until the public know the details of his / her responsibilities, salary and what powers will be devolved from Westminster

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because most of the information you reference is already publicly available:

https://assets.publishing.service.gov.uk/government/uploads/system/uploads/attachment_data/file/754719/North_of_Tyne_Deal.pdf

The North of Tyne combined authority has agreed to pay the mayor a salary of £65,000 a year

We are therefore unsure what further action you would like taken. You could start a new petition to abolish the post of North of Tyne Mayor if that is something you would like to see happen.
